Happy life? I dont think so.

Movie is good. The audio cuts out alot and ranges in volume from loud to soft at times. The video is *mostly* centered toward the theater screen. Also, the hard coded subs (cannot be disabled) are fairly annoying but if they are bearable. 

For a TS this is not bad. 

V: 6
A: 3

If you are a stickler for quality wait for a better release but if you have to see it now and don't mind these things then download away. 

Thanks uploader! It's a great copy minus the audio quirks that occasionally pop in.

So my little cuz Jordan actually admitted in 2006 that he was in FACT Lying about What happened in 93 between him and jackson so he did not molest HIM.And I personally always knew Evan was doing this to make money but my greed kept me from saying anything.He was always borrowing money from me so i was glad that he was getting it somewhere else this time.And on the plus side after the trials i became to know Michael personally and that Man or KID was a the greatest guy to Me.He was nice but really stressed because of all this and He cried in front of me and my family and i couldnÂ´t stand it so i told the truth but nobody listened at that time because the case was settled.So my opinion,MJ was a little crazy guy but NOT a pedophile!
